name: Country Chic Farm
description:
DESCRIPTION
This Country Chic Farm welcomes you to an exceptional place where charm and comfort are the key words for a beautiful French wedding. This dazzling setting will amaze your guests and will undoubtedly be envious of.
Come live the most beautiful experience of your life in a quiet place that will take the stress out of the preparations. For your reception, the Country Chic venue offers a large room allowing you to receive nearly 150 people in a seated configuration. The room is accessible to people with reduced mobility also. For your aperitif, you will enjoy the beautiful days in the English garden and when the cold sets in, the cozy atmosphere by the fireplace will be perfect.
During your meal, the farm will offer you inventive and refined cuisine. You will taste the gourmet flavors of the coast and the Normandy terroir. The team of professionals is always on the lookout for the best local products such as seafood, Cotentin vegetables, pre-salted lamb, etc. No doubt the palates will be filled!
In order to extend the festivities and in order to be able to sleep on site, the Country Chic Farm offers you its ten spacious rooms with refined charm and bright colors. Each with its own personality and decoration to give you the choice.
The farm offers you its services during your business meals, friendly meetings and family dinners. As a group, you will enjoy the beauty of Normandy through this prestigious site that evokes dreams.
Located near Cherbourg in Normandy, the Country Chic Farm awaits you to prepare in good humor the most important meeting of your life.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Pet friendly
Disabled access
Recommended caterer
Recommended suppliers list available
Hotel recommendation list
Marquee available on site
Recommended wedding planner
